### Accomodation

For those travelling out of town, we have a group rate available at the [Schulich Executive Learning Center](http://www.acc-schulichexecutiveconferencecentre.com/hot-dates--rates.html) that includes a hotel room with a continental breakfast. Please contact [Alessandro](alex.filazzola@outlook.com) for information on how to book.
